in.definex.Action

Class ActionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.definex.Action.ActionManager

  • public class ActionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    ActionManager Manages the actions that can be performed by the bot When a new action is added to the actionManager, it puts it in back of the que, and it is performed when it gets in front of the que Created by adam_ on 30-11-2017.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ActionManager()
      Constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Action action)
      Add a new action to the ActionManager
      ChatGroup getActiveChat()
      Returns the current open group chat in whatsapp web
      void gotoGroup(ChatGroup chatGroup)
      used to move to a target group to perform action (waits for 2s after changing group)
      boolean hasPendingWork()
      Used by Checker class to check if actionManager is free, if its free then it gives it checker action to perform
      boolean isWorking()
      returns working status for the actionManager
      void popAndPerform()
      Pops next action in the que, and performs it called in loop method in Looper class

      • isWorking

        public boolean isWorking()
        returns working status for the actionManager
        Returns:
        true if an action is being performed

      • hasPendingWork

        public boolean hasPendingWork()
        Used by Checker class to check if actionManager is free, if its free then it gives it checker action to perform
        Returns:
        true if actionManger has no action to perform
